use_cases: ["identification of contigs containing plasmid-related sequences", "reconstruction of plasmid pBamB1895 from multiple contigs", "validation of the strategy for identifying pLS20-like sequences in NGS projects", "new NGS sequencing project with high coverage to complete the sequence of pBamB1895"]
tools_software: ["SPAdes", "PlasmidSPAdes", "TblastX", "Mauve", "NEBNext DNA library prep kit software (for Illumina)", "FastQC", "IQ-TREE", "MAFFT", "Mummerplot", "Quast", "PROKKA", "Biopython (GenomeDiagram module)", "Inkscape"]
